name: Asteroid Graveyard
description:
After being attacked by an enemy ship, you must repair your warp drive to escape and survive.

I made this game for the Star Trek Jam hosted by @S0phieH using the Unreal Engine (Its my first game with UE4, so im kinda proud :) )

If you have problems or general feedback leave a comment or message me on Twitter (@Draco_Majoris)
